I

IInvestment - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.model
Represents any form of Investment a user may initiate in course of this application.
IInvestmentController - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.controller
This is an interface for Investment related operations from controller.
IInvestmentView - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.view
Represents a dedicated view interface with the basic responsibility of taking input from user and transmitting output for different cases.
initiate(Transaction) - Method in class howtoinvestfordummies.model.AbstractHighLevelInvestmentStrategy
Configures recurring portfolio to create a new type of investment strategy.
initiate(Transaction) - Method in class howtoinvestfordummies.model.DollarCostInvestmentStrategy
This contains the logic of creating a multi-stock portfolio for HighLevelInvestment strategy following Dollar Cost Averaging pattern.
initiate(Transaction) - Method in interface howtoinvestfordummies.model.HighLevelInvestmentStrategy
This method initiates HighLevelInvestmentStrategy.
initiateHighLevelInvestment(Transaction, InvestmentStrategyType) - Method in interface howtoinvestfordummies.model.InvestmentStrategies
Sets up high level investment strategy provided by which type needs to be initiated.
initiateHighLevelInvestment(Transaction, InvestmentStrategyType) - Method in class howtoinvestfordummies.model.InvestmentStrategiesModel
This method first gets the implementation of the required strategy and then calls the respective method to initiate high level investment.
Investment - Class in howtoinvestfordummies.model
Represents a common class for providing implementations specific to all types of investments.
InvestmentController - Class in howtoinvestfordummies.controller
Represents controller implementation for IInvestmentController.
InvestmentController(IInvestmentView, StockInvestmentStrategies) - Constructor for class howtoinvestfordummies.controller.InvestmentController
Represents constructor of this class.
InvestmentStrategies - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.model
This interface is designed with an intention to helps users learn about how money could be invested using different options available in market.
InvestmentStrategiesModel - Class in howtoinvestfordummies.model
Provides an implementation for common activities related to all the type of investments.
InvestmentStrategiesModel() - Constructor for class howtoinvestfordummies.model.InvestmentStrategiesModel
Default constructor which is responsible for initializing the data structure for storing portfolios.
InvestmentStrategyType - Enum in howtoinvestfordummies.model
Enumeration representing Investment Strategy type supported by this application.
InvestmentTextView - Class in howtoinvestfordummies.view
Represents a class with Text based view implementation.
InvestmentTextView(Readable, Appendable) - Constructor for class howtoinvestfordummies.view.InvestmentTextView
Constructor of this class.
IPortfolio - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.model
Represents common interface dedicated for portfolio related operations.
isPortfolioPresent(String) - Method in class howtoinvestfordummies.model.InvestmentStrategiesModel
Helper method to check if the portfolio for the given name exists or not.
IStockAdapter - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.model.adapter
Adapter interface to extra stock data from various external resources.
isTradingHours(Date) - Method in interface howtoinvestfordummies.model.ITradingInformation
States whether the date of investment activity is correct.
ITradingInformation - Interface in howtoinvestfordummies.model
Represents interface to check business logic of the application.
